name: goaway
tagline: A lightweight reverse proxy providing access control and custom responses
description: GoAway is a small reverse proxy written in Go that provides access control and custom HTTP responses. It's designed for small deployments where simplicity and performance are necessary.

features.title: Reverse Proxy
features.description: Route HTTP traffic to backend services with minimal configuration

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Restrict access based on IP addresses, headers, or custom rules

features.title: Custom Responses
features.description: Define custom HTTP responses for specific routes or conditions

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage written in Go for high performance

features.title: Simple Configuration
features.description: Easy setup with straightforward configuration files

features.title: Ssl/tls Support
features.description: Terminate SSL connections and proxy to backend services

features.title: Request Logging
features.description: Track incoming requests for debugging and monitoring purposes

features.title: Small Deployments
features.description: Ideal for personal projects and small-scale infrastructure
